attributes.action: Make a bank holiday to commemorate the queens reign.
attributes.additional_details: It would celebrate the queens reign and would remind the commonwealth about the monarchy on a yearly basis, which would help the monarchy in future.
attributes.background:
Vote and approve the idea to cover all locations where she reigned.
Possible days would be her birthdays, coronation day, her death day or her funeral day.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Queen Elizabeth II Day: New bank holiday 8th September or the Birthday (21.4): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623598

Make the Queens Platinum Jubilee a permanent Bank Holiday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615603
